data.system_settings: Send on iPhone X, iOS 11.1.1, received on Google Pixel XL 2, Android 8.0.1 Oreo
data.client_settings: Sent on iOS app version 1.10.0, received on Android app version 5.6.6
data.actual_result: The screenshot does not load properly.
data.expected_result: The screenshot is displayed properly in-line
data.short_description: iOS 11 screenshots do not display on Android 8 devices
data.steps_to_repro: - Take a screenshot on an iOS 11 device - Send it to a user running Android 8.
